#summary Check to see if two users have accepted a friend request between each other

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_user


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
<tr><td><b>Required</b></td><td><b>Name</b></td><td><b>Type</b></td><td><b>Description</b></td></tr>
<tr><th style="color:#FF6347; font-weight:bold">required</th><td>jabberId</td><td>jid</td><td>Jabber ID of the user initiating the relation check.</td></tr>
<tr><th style="color:#FF6347; font-weight:bold"></th><td>remoteJabberId</td><td>jid</td><td>Jabber ID against which the relation is being tested.</td></tr>
</table>


==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
|| *Code* || *Exception* || *Description* ||
|| 401 || UnauthorizedUserException || You are not authorized to make requests as userid ###. Authorized as ####. ||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <isFriend jabberId="#####@jabber.dev.tokbox.com" remoteJabberId="#######@jabber.dev.tokbox.com">
          <contact jabberId="#######@jabber.dev.tokbox.com">
               <friend>true</friend>
          </contact>
     </isFriend>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/contacts/getRelation</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="####"/>
     <timer startTime="1222156594.4697" execTime="164.00098800659"/>
</tokResult>
}}}

==Notes==
  * Jabber ID must be the user who is authorized to make the API call.
